title: Intermittent signalling issue on the Circle Line

updates.text: [CCL] Due to intermittent signalling issues, train may have longer dwell times at stations. Please cater for longer travel time.
[CCL] CLEARED: Train service is running normally now.
[CCL] Due to intermittent signalling issues, train may have longer dwell times at stations. Pls cater for longer travel time.

[CCL] Due to intermittent signalling issue, please
cater for additional travel time on the CCL today.
